## machine package

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[allocBytes(size)](./machine.allocbytes.md)


</td><td>

Create a new Uint8Array of the specified size, filled with zeros. Equivalent to `Buffer.alloc(size)`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[bg256(colorIndex)](./machine.bg256.md)


</td><td>

Set background color using 256-color palette.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[bgRGB(r, g, b)](./machine.bgrgb.md)


</td><td>

Set background color using RGB true color.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[byteLength(text)](./machine.bytelength.md)


</td><td>

Get the byte length of a string when encoded as UTF-8. Equivalent to `Buffer.byteLength(text, 'utf8')`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[bytesEqual(a, b)](./machine.bytesequal.md)


</td><td>

Compare two Uint8Arrays for equality. Equivalent to `buffer1.equals(buffer2)`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[concatBytes(arrays)](./machine.concatbytes.md)


</td><td>

Concatenate multiple Uint8Arrays into one. Equivalent to `Buffer.concat(arrays)`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[copyBytes(bytes)](./machine.copybytes.md)


</td><td>

Create a copy of a byte array.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createAlwaysEnabledStyle()](./machine.createalwaysenabledstyle.md)


</td><td>

Create a style function that always applies colors (for xterm.js).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createStyle(colorSupport)](./machine.createstyle.md)


</td><td>

Create a chainable style function.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[cursorBackward(n)](./machine.cursorbackward.md)


</td><td>

Move cursor backward (left) by n columns.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[cursorDown(n)](./machine.cursordown.md)


</td><td>

Move cursor down by n rows.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[cursorForward(n)](./machine.cursorforward.md)


</td><td>

Move cursor forward (right) by n columns.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[cursorTo(row, col)](./machine.cursorto.md)


</td><td>

Move cursor to specific position.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[cursorUp(n)](./machine.cursorup.md)


</td><td>

Move cursor up by n rows.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[decodeFirstRune(bytes, offset)](./machine.decodefirstrune.md)


</td><td>

Decode the first complete UTF-8 character from a byte array. Returns the character and its byte length, or null if incomplete.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[decodeString(bytes)](./machine.decodestring.md)


</td><td>

Decode UTF-8 bytes to a string. Equivalent to `buffer.toString('utf8')`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[encodeString(text)](./machine.encodestring.md)


</td><td>

Encode a string to UTF-8 bytes. Equivalent to `Buffer.from(text, 'utf8')`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[fg256(colorIndex)](./machine.fg256.md)


</td><td>

Set foreground color using 256-color palette.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[fgRGB(r, g, b)](./machine.fgrgb.md)


</td><td>

Set foreground color using RGB true color.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[fromBytes(values)](./machine.frombytes.md)


</td><td>

Create a Uint8Array from an array of byte values. Equivalent to `Buffer.from([...])`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[indexOfString(bytes, needle, fromIndex)](./machine.indexofstring.md)


</td><td>

Find the index of a substring within a byte array. Returns -1 if not found.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[scrollDown(n)](./machine.scrolldown.md)


</td><td>

Scroll down by n lines.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[scrollUp(n)](./machine.scrollup.md)


</td><td>

Scroll up by n lines.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

Set scrolling region.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setWindowTitle(title)](./machine.setwindowtitle.md)


</td><td>

Set the terminal window title.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[sliceBytes(bytes, start, end)](./machine.slicebytes.md)


</td><td>

Slice a portion of a byte array. Equivalent to `buffer.subarray(start, end)`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[startsWith(bytes, prefix)](./machine.startswith.md)


</td><td>

Check if a byte array starts with a specific prefix.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[startsWithString(bytes, prefix)](./machine.startswithstring.md)


</td><td>

Check if a byte array starts with a specific string (UTF-8 encoded).


</td></tr>
